about.name: Andrian Kobryn
about.summaryText: Entry-level back-end developer with practical knowledge of C#, ASP.NET Core, EF Core, MS SQL, and foundational front-end skills in HTML, CSS, React, Next.js, and Tailwind. I have an interest in creating efficient and scalable solutions that meet modern development standards. I focus on quality, optimization, and continuous skill improvement, striving to contribute to complex and engaging projects in a team environment.

masters.title: Master's Degree
masters.description: Studied environmental data analysis, economic modeling, and software development for ecological monitoring. Worked on data processing and automation projects.

bachelors.title: Bachelor's Degree
bachelors.description: Gained knowledge in web development, and database management. Studied and worked with Java, C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and SQL. Developed multiple projects using these technologies.

project.title: All project
project.kSpotFrontendDescription: Initially, a user interface was developed using React and SCSS. Later redesigned the project to Next.js to improve performance and include the server side rendering.
project.kSpotBackendDescription: Implemented authentication and authorization using IdentityServer4, data management with Entity Framework Core, and MS SQL as the database. Utilized AutoMapper for object mapping, FluentValidation for input validation, and MediatR to implement the CQRS pattern.
project.deviceShopDescription: Computer Equipment E-commerce Project Developed an e-commerce platform for purchasing computer hardware, focusing on a user-friendly and efficient shopping experience.
